PROJECTS

BLACKJACK

This is a classical casino game developed with React components and Redux for state management (managing deck of cards, shuffling, dealing, managing bets...). The app is styled with Scss and everything is bundeled up with Webpack.

As a player, you start with 3000$ 'cash'. Play as long as you want and refresh the page when you lose money.
Enjoy!

Redux
